name: $diet
desc: Plan for the patient to consume/receive a drug, vaccine or other product

name: $drug
desc: Plan to meet or communicate with the patient (in-patient, out-patient, phone call, etc.)

name: $encounter
desc: Plan to capture information about a patient (vitals, labs, diagnostic images, etc.)

name: $observation
desc: Plan to modify the patient in some way (surgery, physiotherapy, education, counseling, etc.)

name: $procedure
desc: Plan to provide something to the patient (medication, medical supply, etc.)
